frontmatter.title: Remote Machine Learning Internship – Convex Analytics
frontmatter.description: Build production-grade ML pipelines for US fintech clients while working remotely across India.
frontmatter.experienceRequired: Hands-on ML experience via coursework or Kaggle projects
frontmatter.location: Remote – work from anywhere in India
frontmatter.stipend: INR 45,000 per month + remote work allowance
frontmatter.eligibility: Open to students in final year of engineering or data science degrees across India.
education: B.E/B.Tech in Computer Science, AI, or related fields
frontmatter.author: InternshipsHub Editorial

internship.body:
## What you'll build

- Ship feature engineering pipelines for fintech credit scoring models.
- Optimize inference latency across AWS SageMaker endpoints.
- Automate experiment tracking with MLflow and custom dashboards.

## Skills you will sharpen

- Deploying ML services using modern MLOps tooling.
- Collaborating async across product, engineering, and compliance pods.
- Communicating model findings to non-technical stakeholders.

## Interview process

1. Technical resume screen and asynchronous coding challenge.
2. Pair programming round focused on data pipelines.
3. Final culture and collaboration interview with engineering leadership.

frontmatter.title: Product Analytics Internship at Razorpay
frontmatter.description: Join Razorpay's product analytics team to drive insights across payments and capital products while working alongside senior growth leaders.
frontmatter.experienceRequired: Final-year students with prior analytics project experience
frontmatter.stipend: INR 35,000 per month stipend + PPO consideration
frontmatter.eligibility: Open to pre-final and final-year students from accredited universities in India.
education: B.E/B.Tech in Computer Science, Data Science, or related fields
Integrated M.Sc in Statistics or Economics
frontmatter.author: InternshipsHub Editorial

internship.body:
## What you'll work on

- Instrument product funnels across Razorpay Payments, X, and Capital.
- Ship dashboards and cohort analyses to surface conversion drop-offs.
- Collaborate with product managers and growth marketers to design experiments.

## What Razorpay expects

- Comfort with SQL joins, window functions, and building reproducible data pipelines.
- Ability to translate ambiguous product problems into measurable metrics.
- Exposure to Python or R for quick experimentation.

## Selection process timeline

1. Resume screening with emphasis on analytics internships or projects.
2. Case-based product analytics assignment (SQL + experimentation).
3. Final round with product and growth leaders.

## Why this internship matters

The product analytics pod drives monetization for Razorpay's core products. Interns shadow senior analysts, get real ownership on weekly experiments, and plug directly into Razorpay's product roadmap. High performers convert to PPO offers with Level-1 product analytics roles.

frontmatter.title: Associate Product Manager – Zoho
frontmatter.description: Zoho is hiring Associate Product Managers to craft user-first SaaS experiences across its flagship suite.
frontmatter.experienceRequired: 0-2 years experience with at least one shipped product or internship
frontmatter.stipend: Annual package with fixed + performance bonus
frontmatter.eligibility: Open to engineering and management graduates with strong product thinking.
frontmatter.author: InternshipsHub Editorial

job.body:
## Role overview

You will steer user discovery, draft product requirement documents, and collaborate with design and engineering to ship improvements across Zoho's CRM and Finance products.

## Responsibilities

- Own product metrics for a defined module and track releases.
- Translate customer feedback into actionable product requirements.
- Partner with design to create wireframes and prototypes.
- Coordinate with engineering to execute sprints.

## Ideal candidate profile

- Demonstrated product thinking via internships, hackathons, or side projects.
- Strong analytical abilities using SQL or product analytics tools.
- Excellent written and verbal communication.

## Hiring process

1. Online application with product case submission.
2. Product thinking assessment and business writing test.
3. Final onsite rounds with product leaders.

frontmatter.title: AI Research Internship – IISc Bengaluru
frontmatter.description: Work with the IISc Vision Lab on trustworthy AI research contributing to top-tier publications.
frontmatter.experienceRequired: Prior research project or publication in machine learning
frontmatter.location: Department of Computational and Data Sciences, IISc
frontmatter.stipend: INR 20,000 per month with hostel accommodation
frontmatter.eligibility: Open to senior undergraduates and postgraduate students in engineering or sciences.
education: B.E/B.Tech in Computer Science, Electrical, or related fields
M.Tech or M.Sc in Data Science, AI, or Mathematics
frontmatter.author: InternshipsHub Editorial

research.body:
## Research focus

Interns support ongoing projects on trustworthy AI, interpretability, and domain generalization for computer vision tasks.

## Mentor pod

You will be paired with a PhD scholar and faculty mentor, receive weekly feedback loops, and contribute to experiments on large-scale datasets.

## Deliverables

- Reproduce baseline models with improved documentation.
- Execute ablation studies and report insights using lab templates.
- Draft a technical blog or poster summarizing findings.

## Application checklist

1. Updated CV with research experience and GitHub links.
2. Statement of Purpose (500 words) outlining interests in trustworthy AI.
3. Letter of recommendation from faculty or industry mentor.
